  <description>
    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:notna_gradiva/140180</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Notna gradiva - Pastirčki na paši</string>
            <string language="en">Music Notes - Pastirčki na paši</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik-Anmerkungen - Pastir?ki Na pa?i</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes de musique - pa?i de Na de Pastir?ki</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notas da música - pa?i do na de Pastir?ki</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note di musica - pa?i del Na di Pastir?ki</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις μουσικής - Pastir?ki NA pa?i</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Notas de la música - pa?i del na de Pastir?ki</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">"Pastirčki na paši" je naslov ljudske pesmi. Uglasbil jo je Samo Vremšak.</string>
            <string language="en">"Pastirčki na paši" is the title of folk song. The music way composed by Samo Vremšak.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zbor</string>
            <string language="sl">choir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">orkester</string>
            <string language="sl">orchestra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kantata</string>
            <string language="sl">cantata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mladinski zbor</string>
            <string language="sl">youth choir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ljudska pesem</string>
            <string language="sl">folk song</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"Pastir?ki Na pa?i" ist der Titel Volkslied. 
Die Musikmethode bestanden von Samo Vrem?ak.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"le pa?i de Na de Pastir?ki" est le titre de la 
chanson folklorique. La voie de musique composée par Samo 
Vrem?ak.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">de "o pa?i do na Pastir?ki" é o título da 
canção popular. A maneira da música composta por Samo 
Vrem?ak.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"il pa?i del Na di Pastir?ki" è il titolo della 
canzone piega. Il modo di musica composto da Samo Vrem?ak.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Pastir?ki το NA pa?i" είναι ο τίτλος του 
λαϊκού τραγουδιού. Ο τρόπος μουσικής που συντίθεται από 
Samo Vrem?ak.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">"el pa?i del na de Pastir?ki" es el título de la 
canción popular. La manera de la música compuesta por Samo 
Vrem?ak.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
